item.title: Vanilla Javascript Carousel Slider: A Beginner's Tutorial
item.description: Vanilla Javascript Carousel Slider: A Beginner Slider A photo or content slider is one of the oldest, but most popular design assets one can create with javascript. Many developers will reach for popular carousel frameworks such as swiper, slick, or photoswipe. Most of the time, you don’t need so much overhead. Let’s build a slider together and see how we can build a responsive slider without using a ton of a extra javascript.

item.title: Hugo Website Tutorial: How To Create A Hugo Website
item.description: Hugo Website Tutorial: How To Create Your First Hugo Website Hugo is a powerful static website generator written in the GO language. It can help you create clean, modern websites that load quickly with little overhead. item.title: Traverse City Web Developer: I am a web designer in Traverse City
item.description: Many of the people who come to me are small business owners who want a website built. They always want to know how much it’s going to cost then they agonize over which developer they should choose. I try to keep this in mind when I’m talking with them but sometimes I still can’t help but think how lucky they are to have this problem. I wish I could build a website every day and I’m sure many web developers feel the same.
